trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Ionia
There were no other sightings in Ionia on or around July 15th 1975
Summary: neighbor came upon ufo in middle of road at 1am in mourning
divs: Sighting DetailsMy neighbor use to be a janitor at the school one night he he came upon a large light in the road He thought it was a semitruck at first but when he got up next to it it was a saucer that rose from the road and floated off across the swamp He was all shook up the next day telling everyone about it
